title: Ultimate Epic Battle Simulator
notes: After the main window loads, a black screen is shown and the PC freezes. No keyboard input possible; the mouse pointer moves but it's inoperable.
Game loads with Unity standard graphics mode after a brief blank screen, but the in game menu text is missing on most menus. It is possible to play only the FPS Invasion game mode.
title: Ultimate Epic Battle Simulator

gpu: X.Org Gallium 0.4 on AMD HAWAII (DRM 2.49.0 / 4.9.0-8-amd64, LLVM 3.9.1)
notes:
Doesn't work soon as you try to run it.
Failed to initialize graphics.
Make sure you have DirectX 11 installed, have up to date
drivers for your graphics card and have not disabled
3D acceleration in display settings.
InitializeEngineGraphics failed
title: Ultimate Epic Battle Simulator
